name: Marathon (Itch)
description:
so... how long can you keep it up? what's your breaking point??

(NSFW) content warning: there is a (disembodied) human penis in this game

made in 6 hours for Nordic Game Jam 2018

Inspired by the article "The Man Trying to Break the World Record for the Longest Time Spent Masturbating" by merritt k
